titleStmt.title: A spirituall song of a mayds name called Mabell Anna Tatton made by a tenant of the Lord of Canturburies, in the counter in Wood-Streete, very usefull and comfortable both for a believer in particular, and the Church of Christ in generall, James 5. 13. Colos. 3. 16.
titleStmt.author: Starbuck, William.

titleStmt.title: A spirituall song of a mayds name called Mabell Anna Tatton made by a tenant of the Lord of Canturburies, in the counter in Wood-Streete, very usefull and comfortable both for a believer in particular, and the Church of Christ in generall, James 5. 13. Colos. 3. 16.
titleStmt.author: Starbuck, William.

notesStmt.note: Last stanza begins: William Starbuck these verses made.
Verse - "Married thou art to Jesus Christ,".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
